meanings.definition: A system or organization in which people or groups are ranked one above the other according to status or authority.
meanings.sent1: In the school, the teachers were at the top of the hierarchies.
meanings.sent2: The military has a clear hierarchy with generals at the top.
meanings.sent3: At the zoo, the lion thought he was at the top of the hierarchy, but the elephant disagreed.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bees, the queen bee reigns supreme in the hierarchy.
meanings.sent5: The hierarchy in the company was so strict that even the smallest decision had to be approved by multiple levels of management.

meanings.definition: Any system of persons or things ranked one above another.
meanings.sent1: The hierarchy of needs starts with basic necessities like food and shelter.
meanings.sent2: In a competition, there is always a hierarchy of winners and losers.
meanings.sent3: The hierarchy of desserts at the party was clear - the cake was the king!
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the tallest trees form a natural hierarchy reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The hierarchy of power in the animal kingdom determines who leads the pack and who follows.
